channel.title: AutoSpawn Problems
channel.description: Me and my friend are trying to make a server, and iv added a thing to Autospawn [code] spawn = 54 3219 3450 0 0 0 0 0 1 Station Gaurd [ENDOFSPAWNLIST] [/code] We just want it to be a thing so people cant get into this one building. And it compiles fine, but when i try to start teh server, i get [code] Starting Realm Of Darkness on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "5 4 3219 3450 0 0 0 0 0 1 Station G aurd" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1547) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:23) at server.main(server.java:27) [/code] And when i try to log onto the server, i get a black screen. What is wrong? -----------------------------Edit--------------------------------------- I am using the Realm of Darkness Source btw.

item.title: AutoSpawn Problems

do you think you can put the realm of darkness source on uppit and tell me link please ive been looking for the source all daY!

item.title: AutoSpawn Problems
item.dc:creator: @Songoty Songoty
item.description:
@Songoty wrote:

heres my NPC handler line 1547

	newNPC(Integer.parseInt(token3[0]), Integer.parseInt(token3[1]), Integer.parseInt(token3[2]), Integer.parseInt(token3[3]), Integer.parseInt(token3[4]), Integer.parseInt(token3[5]), Integer.parseInt(token3[6]), Integer.parseInt(token3[7]), Integer.parseInt(token3[8]), GetNpcListHP(Integer.parseInt(token3[0])), true);

what do i do? delete it ?

Read full topic

item.title: AutoSpawn Problems
item.dc:creator: @Songoty Songoty
item.description:
@Songoty wrote:

Me and my friend are trying to make a server, and iv added a thing to Autospawn

spawn = 54      3219    3450    0       0       0       0       0       1       Station Gaurd
[ENDOFSPAWNLIST]

We just want it to be a thing so people cant get into this one building. And it compiles fine, but when i try to start teh server, i get

Starting Realm Of Darkness on 0.0.0.0:43594
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "5
4      3219    3450    0       0       0       0       0       1       Station G
aurd"
        at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
        at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1547)
        at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:23)
        at server.main(server.java:27)

And when i try to log onto the server, i get a black screen.
What is wrong?
-----------------------------Edit---------------------------------------
I am using the Realm of Darkness Source btw.

Read full topic
